name: Project Wisp
description:
A puzzle/platformer with mechanics that may make one's head spin. Guide the kindled skull through a dimly lit dungeon and protect the vital fire keeping it afloat (death not implemented yet)

Includes hand-drawn assets and textures and an original soundtrack by our dear Monolith, who was kind enough to lend us a hand during the jam.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the head being the focal point of the theme "out of control"
